attributes.action: Immediately remove all rethink reskill reboot adverts.
attributes.additional_details: This new add campaign is nothing short of an insult to every person in the UK that has spent years of their lives dedicated to a profession they love. Particularly when those telling us to reskill are unaffected. This is like asking Boris Johnson to retrain as a Ballet dancer and Rishi Sunak to get a job as a boxing coach.
attributes.background: I have spent the last 12 years of my life dedicated to a sport that I love. Covid has had huge impact on that sport and I want to know that my government are working towards bringing it back. Saying simply retrain isn’t good enough.

rejection.details: We understand that you are concerned about the Rethink, Reskill, Reboot advertisements, but this campaign was run QA, not the UK Government, so we can't accept a petition calling for it to be ended, as this would be a matter for QA, not the Government or House of Commons.
